trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTMAGIABOARD_00464_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>This strange and mysterious device does not appear to be operational...

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA1EVENTMAGIABOARD_00464_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>The magia melder may be used to affix magicite to or remove it from your magia board. When you have finished experimenting with it, speak with Krile to proceed.
